name: Hisashi Kashima
content: Data Analysis That Matters | Machine Learning and Data Mining Research Laboratory Machine Learning and Data Mining Research Laboratory focuses on research and development of data analysis technologies based on statistical machine learning and their real-world applications. Our research interests include: Advanced machine learning algorithms Innovative applications of machine learning Human computation For more details about our research topics, please see the Research Topics page. If you are interested in joining our laboratory, please refer to the For Prospective Students page. Location #201, #301, #304 (Kashima), #204 (Takeuchi), #306 (Administrative staff) Research Bldg.
